item.title: Running Windows VMs using dockurr/windows
item.description: How to use Docker VMs to run various Windows environments within a Linux-based OS, like Fedora. Sometimes need to access to different Windows versions (7, 10, 11) for testing or other office/work related purposes. Manually installing and managing these versions can be cumbersome. This solution leverages podman with podman-compose and the `dockurr/windows` image to streamline the process.
